name: SWORD MY ASS! (ULTRAMEGA DEMO)
description:
Grab the sword of choice and own their asses...

Im planning on adding another types of swords in future!

Also enemies, levels, bosses, etc

UPDATE 1: SIGN GUY ADDED, ADDED ENDING (SORT OF) AND 1 SECRET

UPDATE 2: cool screenshake when killing an enemy, sword attack cooldown and you can enrage sign-guy now (R to restart while on a first level)

UPDATE 3: Added menu, small adjustments, music on the 1 level become cooler when you kill all the pink guys, esc to go to the menu while playing

UPDATE 4: LOADING BAR ADDED

UPDATE 5: New menu music, thanks to @thiccburger <3, menu overhaul, achievement tab added, Try to get the first achievement by ignoring sign-guy
